_comment: Main state tracking file for ProofChecker .opencode system. Auto-created with self-healing on 2025-12-27. Links to specialized state files for archives and maintenance.

project_numbering._comment: Project numbers wrap around to 000 after 999. Ensure old projects are archived before reuse.

state_references._comment: References to specialized state files. These files are auto-created if missing.

active_projects.implementation_notes: Added @[simp] attribute to swap_past_future_involution. Main theorem is_valid_swap_involution remains incomplete with sorry - simp only pattern unsuccessful. Task 193 remains blocked.

Phases 1-3 completed (3 hours actual vs 18 hours estimated). Phase 4 deferred - testing will occur during normal command usage. Created command-lifecycle.md with 8-stage pattern, updated 4 commands and 6 agents, achieved 39% duplication reduction (1,961 → 1,200 lines).

active_projects.research_findings: Identified 7 critical gaps in task tracking file updates: project state.json never created, artifact links unvalidated, plan updates non-atomic, metadata/version history not tracked. status-sync-manager exists with robust two-phase commit but underutilized (~40% coverage). Hybrid architecture recommended: enhance status-sync-manager + distributed validation for full atomicity, lowest complexity (+205 lines vs +310 centralized, +530 distributed), best extensibility.
active_projects.implementation_notes: All 4 phases completed. Enhanced status-sync-manager with artifact validation, plan metadata tracking, project state.json lazy creation, and plan version history. Updated 4 subagents with validation. Updated 4 commands to delegate all updates. Added comprehensive documentation to command-lifecycle.md and state-schema.md. Total +389 lines across 11 files. Committed with task 215 in commit 90cd574.

active_projects.research_findings: Root cause: .opencode directory missing __init__.py files preventing Python package recognition. MCP client from task 212 is correctly implemented. Solution: Add 2 __init__.py files and configure PYTHONPATH (15-30 min).

completed_projects.summary: Fixed /todo command specification to remove complete task blocks (heading + body) with explicit structure definition, boundary patterns, and validation
Resolved is_valid_swap_involution blocker by removing unprovable theorem and documenting circular dependency with Soundness.lean for future completion
Removed historical comparisons and applied full XML styling to orchestrator.md (100% consistent with error-diagnostics-agent.md pattern)
Update examples to use latest proof strategies and patterns
Fixed 3 build errors in DeductionTheorem.lean by replacing .elim patterns with by_cases tactic
Improve MAINTENANCE.md documentation structure and content
Fixed 2 termination proof errors by adding noncomputable keyword to generalized_modal_k and generalized_temporal_k
Added review summary artifacts to /review command with reviewer.md subagent, lazy directory creation, and state.json schema v1.1.0
Enhanced routing logic in /research, /implement commands and orchestrator to ensure Lean tasks route to lean-implementation-agent and lean-research-agent with validation and logging
Reduced command output verbosity for /implement and /plan commands with artifact-based summaries and brief return formats, achieving 90-95% context window reduction
Fixed verbose artifact output in legacy subagents (implementer.md, task-executor.md) by replacing full artifact echoing with brief summaries, achieving 90-95% context window reduction
Implemented MCP client wrapper and enhanced lean-lsp-mcp integration enabling real-time Lean compilation checking during implementation tasks

technical_debt._comment: Technical debt tracked in task system. 10 sorry (1 invalid/unprovable theorem at Truth.lean:691, 1 completeness, 3 proof search docs, 5 doc comments), 11 axioms (all completeness). Build errors: 2 in GeneralizedNecessitation.lean (task 192 - completed), 1 in Truth.lean (tasks 193-194-213 - unprovable theorem identified).
